title: Path of Roller Coaster part - c

content.description: A particle moves long the x-axis so that its velocity v at any time t, for <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>16</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CAC@</annotation> </semantics> </math> is given by v(t) = e2sint - 1. At time t = 0, the particle is at the origin.
content.question: Find the total distance traveled by the particle from t = 0 to t = 4.

frqParts.text: Find the total distance traveled by the particle from t = 0 to t = 4.

topic.text: 8.2: Connecting Position, Velocity, and Acceleration Functions Using Integrals

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
